item.title: Add Font
item.description: download sarasa ttf zip from GitHub select mono and ui fonts 1 fc-list 1 mkdir sarasa_mono_XX & sarasa_ui_XX copy fonts folders to ~/.fonts notice: chmod -R 755, or system cannot scan new fonts flush font cache 1 fc-cache -fv notice: if you want to change the font of the stupid qterminal in Kali, yo should go to ~/.config/qterminal.org/qterminal.ini to manually modify it, you might cannot see new fonts in terminal font list GUI
